query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS identity_snapshots (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  snapshotDate DATE NOT NULL,
  currentIdentity TEXT NOT NULL,
  targetIdentity TEXT NOT NULL,
  contradictions TEXT,
  alignmentScore INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS milestones (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  targetDate DATE,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'in_progress',
  progress INT DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  completedAt TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS life_vision (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  mission TEXT NOT NULL,
  coreValues TEXT,
  longTermGoals TEXT,
  oneYearVision TEXT,
  fiveYearVision TEXT,
  tenYearVision TEXT,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id),
  UNIQUE KEY unique_user_vision (userId)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS milestones (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  targetDate DATE,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'in_progress',
  progress INT DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  completedAt TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS life_vision (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  mission TEXT NOT NULL,
  coreValues TEXT,
  longTermGoals TEXT,
  oneYearVision TEXT,
  fiveYearVision TEXT,
  tenYearVision TEXT,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id),
  UNIQUE KEY unique_user_vision (userId)
);
